actionfx-core
  • All Classes
 

Package com.github.actionfx.core.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter fields to be operated on by a field callback.
    ReflectionUtils.MethodFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter methods to be operated on by a method callback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AFXUtils
    Util-class for working with JavaFX.
    AnnotationUtils
    Utils class for working with annotations.
    AsyncUtils
    Utils for performing tasks in an asynchronous fashion.
    BooleanBindingBuilder
    Builder class for creating a BooleanBinding for one or many Controls or Observables.
    BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateBuilder<T>
    Builder class for creating a single predicate meant to be addded to a larger predicate chain.
    BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateElement<T>
    Represents a single predicate that can be chained together with other predicates.
    ClassPathScanningUtils
    Utils for scanning the classpath.
    ExceptionUtils
    Utils for working with exceptions in ActionFX.
    MessageUtils
    Util class for handlung internationalized messages.
    ReflectionUtils
    Utils for handling reflections.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp
    Enum describes whether a predicate must match all testables or at least one testable.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NestedThrowableException
    Wrapper class for transporting a Throwable as RuntimeException.
